nodes.name: Superuser

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account that's not a superuser.
nodes.name: onlySuperuser

nodes.documentation: @dev getter to determine if address has superuser role
nodes.name: isSuperuser

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current superuser to transfer his role to a newSuperuser.
@param _newSuperuser The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferSuperuser

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current superuser or owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.

Superuser

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account that's not a superuser.
nodes.name: onlySuperuser

nodes.documentation: @dev getter to determine if address has superuser role
nodes.name: isSuperuser

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current superuser to transfer his role to a newSuperuser.
@param _newSuperuser The address to transfer ownership to.

nodes.name: transferOwnership

checkRole(address,string).details: reverts if addr does not have role

params._role: the name of the role // reverts

isSuperuser(address).details: getter to determine if address has superuser role

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current superuser or owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferSuperuser(address).details: Allows the current superuser to transfer his role to a newSuperuser.

params._newSuperuser: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
